bottlenecks.description: ChatBot component loading immediately on client hydration despite being non-critical, increasing Main Thread blocking time.

selected_fix.description: Deferred loading of ChatBot component on Appointment page using 4s timeout (simulating idle callback).
selected_fix.safety_check: Retained placeholder button to prevent layout shift. Component loads seamlessly when user waits or clicks (if implemented, but here it auto-loads after 4s).

verification.expected_impact: Reduced Total Blocking Time (TBT) on /appointments by removing ChatBot initialization from critical path.
